title.narrative: CP IR7.7:KIR-CHILD&FAMILY WELFARE SYSTEM

description.narrative: CP Programme Component Results (PCR) 7 IR7.7: By 2017 Kiribati government and civil society strengthen quality of and access to child protection services, which contributes to Access To Justice, Birth Registration, Child Protection And Emergencies, Child Protection Systems, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Child Protection Systems (including Justice and Police, child and family social services, health and education and communities) provide improved quality of and access to services for the prevention of and response to violence, abuse and exploitation of children at all times.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: CP PCR 7 IR7.7: By 2017 Kiribati government and civil society strengthen quality of and access to child protection services

description.narrative: Quality of services for children needing protection will improve because of the elaboration of a Child Protection Act implementation manual for service providers, and training of police; and youth knowledge of risks and implementation of prevention measures will increase through awareness-raising activities conducted by police in communities and schools. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:29/12/2017

title.narrative: Percentage of children under 5 years of age with formal birth registration.
Established inter-agency protocols and procedures for case management.

actual.value: 2017:Included in 2013 CYPFW Act implementation manual but there is room for improvement

title.narrative: Existence of free and universal birth registration service within the civil registration in accordance with national legal requirements

actual.value: 2017:Registration and certificate within time limit is free; late registration and certificate with fee
